name: Alexander Serganov
title: Principal Investigator
lab_synopsis: We use a combination of biophysical methods, biochemical techniques, and structural approaches, including X-ray crystallography and cryo-electron microscopy, to elucidate molecular mechanisms of fundamental cellular processes associated with biosynthesis of RNA, metabolism of RNA, and RNA-mediated gene expression control. We study Fragile X syndrome and antibiotic resistance. We design small molecule drugs to target proteins.
common_experiments_raw: X-ray crystallography, cryo-EM, biochemical assays, drug design
